column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Thank you for your visit. At Bosscat & Libations we certainly strive for our customers to enjoy a unique dining experience from beginning to end. Our sincere apologies
column2: as it was definitely not their intent to come across that way rather just standard procedure they typically employs so that they are on the same page. We do sincerely apologize and would like to invite you back for a drink or dessert of your choice. I have discussed at length with the valet owner about ways we can definitely improve our communication with customers. I do hope to see you soon . Once again Thank you for your patronage!
